attributes.title: Fan Service is Back! - #01
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses the Return of Fan Service
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, and Yssa Badiola as they discuss Summer 2016 Anime, Re: Zero, their Anime Book Club, and more on this week's Fan Service.This episode originally aired October 21, 2016.

attributes.title: Look At Us Like Strawberries- #02
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Re:Zero
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, and Cole as they discuss what Stan thinks about in the Shower, Drifters, Yuri!!! On Ice and more on this week's Fan Service! This episode originally aired on October 28, 2016.

attributes.title: Stan-ime - #03
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Good "Gateway" Anime
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Austin Hardwicke and Cole Gallian as they discuss Stan Lee Anime, Introductory Anime, Drifters and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired November 04, 2016

attributes.title: The Reverse, Reverse, Reverse Harem  - #04
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses What We've Been Watching This Season
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Austin Hardwicke and Cole Gallian as they discuss Death Note Advertisements, Kiss Him Not Me, Sports Anime  and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired November 11, 2016.

attributes.title: Sometimes People Have To Die - #05
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses 90s Anime
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Cole Gallian, Austin Hardwicke and special guests Michael and Lindsay Jones as they discuss Dragon Ball Z, Yu-Gi-Oh, Drifters, and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired November 18, 2016.

attributes.title: You Don't Win An Award - #06
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Anime That's Not Anime
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Cole Gallian, Andrea Caprotti, and special guest Shannon McCormick as they discuss Avatar: The Last Airbender, Thunderbolt Fantasy, Yuri on Ice, and more on this week's Fan Service.This episode originally aired November 25, 2016.

attributes.title: The A-Team - #07
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Pokemon
attributes.description: Join Cole Gallian, Kim Newman, Austin Hardwick, and Stan Lewis as they discuss Pokemon, Gainax, Drifters, and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired December 2, 2016.

attributes.title: Back From Japan - #08
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Their Trip to Japan
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, Yssa Badiola, Cole Gallian, Austin Hardwicke and special guest Mica Burton as they discuss Attack On Titan Season 2, Japan, Yuri on Ice, and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired December 9, 2016

attributes.title: All These Brotherhoods - #09
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Digital Anime Wives
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Cole Gallian, Austin Hardwicke and special guest Elyse Willems as they discuss Gate Box, Drifters, Ghost in the Shell, and more on this week's Fan Service! This episode originally aired December 16, 2016

attributes.title: Something Wrong with my Vablina - #10
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Gundams
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, Yssa Badiola, Austin Hardwicke and special guest Tony Salvaggio as they discuss the live action Naruto movie, Gundam, Yuri on Ice, and more on this week's Fan Service! This episode originally aired December 23, 2016

attributes.title: See You in 20XX - #11
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses Fall 2016 Anime Finales
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Austin Hardwicke and Cole Gallian as they discuss Attack on Titan Season 2, Yuri on Ice, Drifters, and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired December 30, 2016

attributes.title: Kanpai: I'm So F*cked Right Now - #12
attributes.caption: Fan Service Discusses the Season in Review
attributes.description: Join Gray Haddock, Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna, Yssa Badiola, Austin Hardwicke, Stan Lewis, and Cole Gallian as they discuss the season in review, anime to watch in 2017, and more on this week's Fan Service!This episode originally aired January 6, 2017
attributes.display_title: Kanpai: I'm So F*cked Right Now - #12
